column4: 2010-12-19T15:49:00.000Z	databits		how do I go about opening wine" once I have the package installed ?
it should be in the menu, and from command line you can run it with "wine <file>"
I don't think there's much for running wine by itself, though, as it's an emulator you should be running some program with wine, instead of just wine itself.
I think it also associates itself with .exe, so if you try opening and .exe with file manager, it probably runs it with wine automatically
for example, if you want to install something with "setup.exe", just find that file and run it, or either run from the command line "wine setup.exe"
